original_text: Paul himself wanted to go there. He wanted to speak to the crowd. But the other believers would not let him do that.
korean_text: 바울이 백성 가운데로 들어가고자 하나 제자들이 말리고

sentences.original_text: Paul himself wanted to go there
He wanted to speak to the crowd
But the other believers would not let him do that
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 다른 믿는 사람들은 그렇게 하도록 그를 내버려 두지 않았습니다
